title: Grand Slam: More Recipes from the Best of Bridge
description: You'll find a list of menu suggestions for all occassions. Most requested recipes include: "Bomb Shelter Croustades," "Cocktail Spread," "How Cheesy Do You Want It?" and "Terriyaki Salmon Steaks." Serve "Unattended Roast Beef" and "French Lemon Pie" -- Entertaining made easy
author: Best of Bridge
